hunter.opener: What do you think of my fit? Cool, right? I wear this to get closer to the deer so we don’t frighten them when we hunt!
hunter.request: Speaking of the hunt, we’re going out soon. Can you help me find some deer?
hunter.closer: Sweet, thanks! Here’s some berries from the manzanita bushes I just collected.
hunter.seal: A seal piece? Hm, I haven't heard of this seal thing, but I will keep an eye out for it.

weaver.opener: Ugh, I’m so close to finishing this basket but I’m almost out of deer grass fibers!
weaver.request: Please find some deer grass for me so I can finish this faster. I will trade you with something really cool!
weaver.closer: Oh my goodness, you’re a life saver! I can definitely finish this basket now.
weaver.seal: The cool thing? I heard the chief found something in the forest today. No one knows what it is but it is quite shiny...

gatherer.opener: Oh hey, don't trample the redbud and deer grass crops! I'm just about to harvest them.
gatherer.request: You’re looking for some deer grass? You’re in luck! We harvested some earlier. I’ll trade it for some clam shells.
gatherer.closer: I can’t believe you got clam shells that quickly, impressive! Here’s the deer grass fibers, as promised.
gatherer.seal: I'm not sure what a seal is, but I heard it was hard enough to open clams.

fisher.opener: Man, fishing sure is hard. I’m not used to this bone harpoon.
fisher.request: Maybe a net would work better? I saw one back in the village. I'll give you clam shells in exhange.
fisher.closer: Thanks for the help! I definitely can catch some fish now. Here, take these shells as my token of gratitude.
fisher.seal: The object? I heard it was a rare rock, something I’ve never seen before. The color looks a bit like wood or acorn…

builder.opener: Oh this? This is a dome house! We live in dome house made of earth and willow branches. You'll be surprised at how spacious it is inside.
builder.request: Great, you're here! Can you find me some more willow branches and grapevines? I need a few more supports for this dome house.
builder.closer: Amazing, thank you! We can definitely finish this by sundown.
builder.seal: The chief? Oh, he's in this dome! You should ask him about that mysterious object he found earlier.
